outputs.output_descr:
The Strategic Planning and Policy Development (SPPD) Programme (the SPPD Programme or Programme hereinafter) is a framework program designed to strengthen strategic planning, policy development and public resources management of BiH's public institutions. The Programme will work with line ministries at the level of Bosnia and Herzegovina (BiH) Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina (FBiH) and Republika Srpska (RS) by supporting and institutionalizing organizational and human resource capacities in particular for strategic planning and policy development activities which will, in turn, contribute to the improved linkages between strategic priorities and resources available.It is a cross-cutting program that overtime intends to include more sectors.

The SPPD Programme derives from the Public Administration Reform (PAR) Strategy and supports the adoption of European Union (EU) public administration standards in BiH.

project_descr:
Strengthening National capacities for Strategic Planning and Policy Development
(SPPD) Phase I
